description: Press an imaginary button on or off

intents.name: DoButtonOn
intents.description: User is asking for a button press on
utterances: would you press the on button
i need you to press the on button
push the damn on button thank you

intents.name: DoButtonOff
intents.description: User is asking for a button press off
utterances: would you press the off button
i need you to press the off button
push the damn button off thank you
